TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Automation extends System.Object
public ref class Automation abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Contains methods and fields for UI Automation client applications.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AddAutomationEventHandler (System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent eventId, System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement element, System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope scope, System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventHandler eventHandler);

.method public static hidebysig void AddAutomationEventHandler(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent eventId, class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement element, valuetype System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope scope, class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventHandler eventHandler) cil managed
Public Shared Sub AddAutomationEventHandler (eventId As AutomationEvent, element As AutomationElement, scope As TreeScope, eventHandler As AutomationEventHandler)

public: static void AddAutomationEventHandler(System::Windows::Automation::AutomationEvent ^ eventId, System::Windows::Automation::AutomationElement ^ element, System::Windows::Automation::TreeScope scope, System::Windows::Automation::AutomationEventHandler ^ eventHandler);

static member AddAutomationEventHandler : System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent * System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement * System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope * System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventHandler -> unit

Docs.param: The identifier for the event the method will handle.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to associate with the event handler.
The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and descendants.
The method to call when the specified event occurs.
Docs.summary: Registers a method that handles [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] events.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Algunas clases, como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>, identificar eventos que son específicos de la clase de campos de exponer. El <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A> método proporciona un mecanismo que permite registrar controladores para estos eventos.
`eventHandler` puede ser una instancia del método o una referencia al método (`AddressOf` en Visual Basic).

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler (System.Windows.Automation.AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler eventHandler);
.method public static hidebysig void AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler eventHandler) cil managed
Public Shared Sub AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler (eventHandler As AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler)
public: static void AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler(System::Windows::Automation::AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler ^ eventHandler);
static member AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler : System.Windows.Automation.AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler -> unit

Docs.param: The method to call when the event occurs.
Docs.summary: Registers a method that will handle focus-changed events.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Eventos de cambio de foco son todo el sistema; no se puede establecer un ámbito más restringido.
`eventHandler` puede ser una instancia del método o una referencia al método (`AddressOf` en Visual Basic).
## Examples El ejemplo siguiente muestra este método que se usa para agregar un controlador de eventos para los cambios de foco.
[!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#102)]

Docs.param: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element with which to associate the event handler.
The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and children.
The method to call when the event occurs.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] properties of interest.
Docs.summary: Registers a method that will handle property-changed events.

remarks.format:
## Remarks El [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elemento especificado por proporcionado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento podría no admite las propiedades especificadas por el `properties` parámetro.
`eventHandler` puede ser una instancia del método o una referencia al método (`AddressOf` en Visual Basic).
## Examples Ejemplo de código siguiente agrega un controlador de eventos que realiza escuchas de un cambio en el estado habilitado de un elemento especificado.
[!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#172](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/PropertySnips.cs#172)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#172](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/PropertySnips.vb#172)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks `eventHandler` puede ser una instancia del método o una referencia al método (`AddressOf` en Visual Basic).
## Examples El ejemplo siguiente muestra un delegado de controlador de eventos de cambio de estructura que se llamará cada vez que el subárbol del elemento especificado <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> cambios.
[!code-csharp[UIAFocusTracker_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/CSharp/FocusTracker.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAFocusTracker_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/VisualBasic/FocusTracker.vb#105)]
Ejemplo de código siguiente agrega una instancia del delegado.
[!code-csharp[UIAFocusTracker_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/CSharp/FocusTracker.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAFocusTracker_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/VisualBasic/FocusTracker.vb#104)]

Docs.summary: Compares the specified parameters to determine whether they refer to the same user interface (UI) element.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Compare (int[] runtimeId1, int[] runtimeId2);
.method public static hidebysig bool Compare(int32[] runtimeId1, int32[] runtimeId2) cil managed
Public Shared Function Compare (runtimeId1 As Integer(), runtimeId2 As Integer()) As Boolean
public: static bool Compare(cli::array <int> ^ runtimeId1, cli::array <int> ^ runtimeId2);
static member Compare : int[] * int[] -> bool

Docs.param: The first run-time ID to compare.
The second run-time ID to compare.
Docs.summary: Compares two integer arrays containing run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] to determine whether their content is the same.
Docs.returns: if the compared run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] refer to the same [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element; otherwise .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Si alguno de los argumentos es una referencia nula (`Nothing` en Visual Basic), <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.Compare%2A> produce una <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> excepción.
## Examples La función de ejemplo siguiente determina si un identificador de tiempo de ejecución está en una lista de tiempo de ejecución [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)].
[!code-csharp[UIAFocusTracker_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/CSharp/FocusTracker.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAFocusTracker_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/VisualBasic/FocusTracker.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Compare (System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement el1, System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement el2);
.method public static hidebysig bool Compare(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement el1, class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement el2) cil managed
Public Shared Function Compare (el1 As AutomationElement, el2 As AutomationElement) As Boolean
public: static bool Compare(System::Windows::Automation::AutomationElement ^ el1, System::Windows::Automation::AutomationElement ^ el2);
static member Compare : System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement * System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement -> bool

Docs.param: The first [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to compare.
The second [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to compare.
Docs.summary: Compares two [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements, returning if both refer to the same [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] element.
Docs.returns: if the run time identifiers of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are the same; otherwise .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Si alguno de los argumentos es una referencia nula (`Nothing` en Visual Basic), <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.Compare%2A> produce una <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> excepción.
Este método es equivalente al operador de igualdad para <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> objetos.

Docs.summary: Represents a predefined view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree that includes only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that can contain content.

remarks.format:

## Examples El ejemplo siguiente muestra el nombre de cada patrón de control admitido por un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
> [!NOTE] > Una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetSupportedPatterns%2A> requiere una gran cantidad de procesamiento, ya que consulta el <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> para todos los patrones posibles.
